global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_text_align=”left” header_font_size=”28px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

YOUR TRUSTED TRACTORS MANUFACTURERS & TRACTORS SUPPLIERS

We commenced our journey with the production of 2050 DI tractors in the year 2000. All these years later, we have diversified into other machines as well, but manufacturing the best farm tractor will always be special to us. Being a credible tractors manufacturers and dealers, every tractor we make is a tangible realization of our dream to empower the farmer by providing them in return for their trusted investment, a powerful machine that is not only easy to maintain and smooth to operate but also adequately fuel-saving.

Our tractors employ best in class technology and innovation—giving us an unsurpassable edge over our market competitors. Being one of the best tractor manufacturers in India, we provide end-to-end services i.e. from unique models that give you the choice of having dry or oil-immersed brakes, to the ones with mobile charging slot, to the engines of utmost power, for creating the best farm tractor and its spare parts that are well-suited for your agricultural practices and/or other processes. Besides manufacturing, we are pride to say that our reliable tractors dealers efficiently deliver your desired tractor at your doorstep.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
